title: Anyway...what is an Australian?
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Ethnic attitudes
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Pluralism (Social sciences)
description: Views the concept of multiculturalism through the eyes of several Australians in multicultural Melbourne. Through these people's lives, the most typical element of Australian society is seen to be a continuing pattern of cultural interchange. A spectrum of ideas, attitudes and values which reflect the diversity of opinions, traditions and life-styles current among the Australian population. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
